'''Fruit-Flavored Milk Candies''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Chocolate]] with [[Xilonen]]. The [[recipe]] for Chocolate can be found in an [[Exquisite Chest]] in the [["Children of Echoes"]].

Fruit-Flavored Milk Candies restores '''130''' Stamina with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
